answers.answer: It could be dehydration too. I went through something like this last Friday and struggled through it over the weekend. Drink lots of water and if you cant keep anything down - like food - my Dr has me drinking Gatorade.
I drink plenty of water. So i doubt it

question: have a regular appointment tomorrow but been having all these headaches and got really lightheaded 2 times this morning that i called and they are seeing me at 4pm today. im scared it might be preeclampsia but my blood pressure has been fine this whole time. so idk..we shall see
